title: Did CNN Publish Contradictory Articles on Hydroxychloroquine?
subtitle: Information about hydroxychloroquine as a treatment for COVID-19, published in two CNN articles, was neither contradictory nor inaccurate — despite attempts to make it look that way.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: A graphic shows contradictory CNN articles about hydroxychloroquine, published three months apart and co-authored by the same person.
